traits.name: Keen Sight
entries: The ithjar has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Slippery Serpent
entries: The ithjar has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple or saving throws to avoid being {@condition paralyzed} or {@condition restrained}.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The ithjar attacks once with its bite and once with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the ithjar can't use its tail on another target.
